league.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a group of sports teams or players who play games against each other to see who is best
league.translation[0].definitions[0].not: be (at the) top/bottom of the league (=be the best or the worst team in a group)
league.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: He makes his football league debut tomorrow.
league.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a group of people or countries who have joined together because they have similar aims, political beliefs etc
league.translation[0].definitions[2].def: an ancient unit for measuring distance, equal to three miles or about 4,828 metres on land, and three nautical miles or 5,556 metres at sea
